items.name: x_unc
items.info: Global X coor unc (cm) of hit

items.name: y_unc
items.info: Global Y coor unc (cm) of hit

items.name: z_unc
items.info: Global Z coor unc (cm) of hit

items.name: tx
items.info: Global X coor (cm) of hit from CVT info -trkID index

items.name: ty
items.info: Global Y coor (cm) of hit from CVT info - trkID index

items.name: tz
items.info: Global Z coor (cm) of hit from CVT info - trkID index

items.name: tlength
items.info: pathlength of the track from the entrance point to the exit point through the hit bar

items.name: pathlength
items.info: pathlength of the track from the vertex (doca point to the beamline to the midpoint between the entrance and exit of the hit bar

info: reconstructed cluster info from CND and CTOF

items.name: sector
items.info: sector of the cluster's seed hit

items.name: layer
items.info: layer of the cluster's seed hit

items.name: component
items.info: component of the cluster's seed hit

items.name: nhits
items.info: number of hits of the cluster

items.name: energy
items.info: Sum of E dep (MeV) of the hits

items.name: x
items.info: center of X coor (cm) of the hits

items.name: y
items.info: center of Y coor (cm) of the hits

items.name: z
items.info: center of Z coor (cm) of the hits

items.name: time
items.info: center of time (ns) of the hits
